messages.message: this one is more alarming — all the `deployment` tests are failing because the `Add SLA` button is disabled. https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11395/overview/1fe7f1d4-43bd-41f6-8260-dc54e27eca0c?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
I just made SLAs GA, so it must have something to do with that :eyes:
I logged into the same account this test is using and the SLA button is not disabled there... I'll keep investigating
um, I do see it as being disabled
the test is using `<mailto:hoangpaul+pikachu@instabase.com|hoangpaul+pikachu@instabase.com>` which is a commercial, not enterprise, account
Okay I see this on the Cypress cluster now, but not on my sandbox despite pulling down master
I observed ^ on the actual CI sandbox
https://crafting-aihub--pr-58587-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/deployments/create

So we can either:
1. Upgrade this account to enterprise (I assume as we make some other features, like advanced apps, GA we'll run into this)
2. Make a new org and account for enterprise testing
I'm also wondering why it is that the logic allowed our commercial org to use this while it was set to IB_OPT_IN and IB_OPT_OUT, but not while it's set to GA.

@Xindi Xu can you weigh in on the options and how switching to GA affected it here?
we have a new org for enterprise uses, I think we intentionally kept this as commercial
yes. We still want to have cypress tests cover commercial org case.

> the logic allowed our commercial org to use this while it was set to IB_OPT_IN and IB_OPT_OUT, but not while it's set to GA
The logic is that, IB users can always access to preview features but once GA'ed, the tier needs to match up
ya im confused how the same commercial orgs were able to add SLA when feature was opt out
oh wow
@Udit some of your tests are now failing because of this too fyi
@Udit @Jessica https://share.1password.com/s#BVNb8dyLuaMWAOr9H5IpMgwgYDxKSTvuv9DyGto2e7Q this is the link to the enterprise org creds
okay then we need to create new enterprise orgs for some tests
I will queue up a PR changing the users
oh okay time to recreate it all again a 6th time :joy:
thoughts on creating a new enterprise org vs just upgrading the existing one?
we already have a new enterprise org — I don’t think we need any action on the org (?). Like mentioned before it’s good for testing to have both
here's the feature flagging summary: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XbszN-7RRfv6uSYcdGzLmcEumy1dYu5xM8Nazp1TJBs/edit#heading=h.3uohx5izjn0t
On aihub-sandbox and aihub-uat, are our new orgs there also ocmmercial?

> a new enterprise org
Nice. Is this a cypress only org?
I should have realized this would happen sooner :sweat_smile:
Yeah same hahah. So we'll have to recreate everything on all 3 environments
the one I linked is on the main crafting cluster. I’m guessing when we move to the crafting cypress cluster we’ll have to do this all over again
yah i’ll recreate it all td for my dashboard tests!
@Udit I'll also add the enterprise org user account for your reviewer one
I don't see credentials for the enterprise orgs in sandbox and uat in 1pass, but we do have those orgs set up, right? Do I need to make new users?
I can set up new enterprise orgs in sandbox and uat and cypress CI just for cypress tests
That would be great @Xindi Xu. Lmk when that's done and I can create the necessary users and add them to 1pass
Created 3 enterprise orgs in sandbox, uat, and Cypress CI. Search for "Cypress CI" and "Cypress Jenkins" in 1pass
Oh you created the users too, thank you!!
is cypress CI the new cypress sandbox or the existing crafting sandboxes?
The new cypress sandbox. The url should be saved in 1pass as well
But the current credentials in the code are for the old cypress sandbox, so I'm using the enterprise org in the old one too... right? I'm losing track of all these sandboxes and orgs haha
yea, before the migration to the new cypress CI env is complete, use the old one, which is linked by Arjun above
okay so essentially need to recreate the testing environment required for tests in 4 environments atm
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/58810
@Xindi Xu the admin login for the cypress-ci-enterprise does not have enterprise features? Is there an easy for me to enable this?
which env is this?
https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com
ahh so sorry. Fixed! :lolcry:
Thank you for the quick fix!
